page.title: 01KIRKNEWTON, NORTHUMBERLAND
page.content: { { Kirknewton}is a small village situated in the{Cheviot}foothills in the North of {Northumberland. }The surrounding area is mainly hill farmland.The{Northumberland National {Park}occupies the area to the South & West of the B6351 which runs through the village. It has a church (CofE), a First School, a Post Office and a village hall. The{Bowmont Water}runs from the NW to join the {College Burn }at Kirknewton,where together they form the{River Glen}. The people living in the area are,in the main,farmers,farm workers and hill shepherds. The total population is approx. 100.
